com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.inmemdb
Interface Loader

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDBUnitLoader, AbstractLoader, DBUnitCSVLoader, DBUnitFlatXMLLoader, DBUnitXLSLoader, DBUnitXMLLoader, SQLLoader
public interface Loader

The interface that must be implemented by classes that execute DDL/DML scripts or load data.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Brian Matthews

Field Summary
static String CANNOT_READ_SOURCE_FILE
          The message key for the error reported when a source file cannot be read.
static String ERROR_PROCESSING_SOURCE_FILE
          The message key for the error reported when a source file cannot be processed.
 
Method Summary
 boolean isSupported(Logger logger, File source)
          Determine whether or not the data or script can be loaded or executed.
 void load(Logger logger, Database database, File source)
          Load data into or execute a script against the in-memory database.

Method Detail

isSupported

boolean isSupported(Logger logger,
                    File source)
                    throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
Determine whether or not the data or script can be loaded or executed.

Parameters:
logger - Used to report errors and raise exceptions.
source - The source file containing the data or script.
Returns:
  • true if the data or script can be loaded or executed.
  • falseif the data or script cannot be loaded or executed.
Throws:
org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - If there was an error checking that the data or script is supported by the loader.

load

void load(Logger logger,
          Database database,
          File source)
          throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException
Load data into or execute a script against the in-memory database.

Parameters:
logger - Used to report errors and raise exceptions.
database - The in-memory database.
source - The source file containing the data or script.
Throws:
org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoFailureException - If there was an error loading data or executing the script.
